item.title: Lecture 2 - Data structures, Reproducible Research, loading, cleaning and munging data in R
item.description: Todayâ€™s Agenda Review the concepts of Reproducible Research Review Git Importing, cleaning and munging data Summarizing and exploring data Vectors, matrices, and data frames Reproducible Research | Review This was the scenario: You had worked 6 months to analyze a data set. Someone else analyzes the data and comes to different conclusions. How good are your notes??? Answer: Awesome, because you annotated your code with text to create a RR compendium
